T02prmosulu:3: buddhena lokārthacareṇa tāyinā sudeśitaṃ prātimokṣaṃ vidunā // 1 //
T02prmosulu:4: taṃ prātimokṣaṃ bhavaduḥkhamokṣaṃ śrutvāna dhīrāḥ sugatasya bhāṣitaṃ /
T02prmosulu:6: cirasya labdhvā ratanāni trīṇi buddhotpādaṃ mānuṣikāñ ca śraddhāṃ /
T02prmosulu:8: śīlena yukto śramaṇo 'tiveti śīlena yukto brāhmaṇo 'tiveti /
T02prmosulu:9: śīlena yukto naradevapūjyo śīlena yuktasya hi prātimokṣaṃ // 4 //
T02prmosulu:10: anekabuddhānumataṃ viśuddhaṃ śīlaṃ pratiṣṭhā dharaṇīva sānuṃ /
T02prmosulu:11: udāhariṣyāmy ahaṃ saṃghamadhye hitāya lokasya sadevakasya // 5 //
T02prmosulu:14: pracchādayanti hṛdayaṃ gaganam iva samunnatā meghāḥ //
T02prmosulu:17: kiṃ poṣadhena teṣāṃ ye te sāvadyaśīlacaritrāḥ /
T02prmosulu:19: kāryaṃ ca poṣadhena teṣāṃ ye te anavadyaśīlacāritrāḥ /
T02prmosulu:23: kāryaṃ ca poṣadhena teṣāṃ lajjinām abhinnavṛttaśīlānāṃ /
T02prmosulu:25: kiṃ poṣadhena teṣāṃ ye te duḥśīlapāpakarmāntāḥ /
T02prmosulu:26: kuṇapam iva samudrato samutkṣiptāḥ śāstu prāvacanāt //
T02prmosulu:27: kāryaṃ ca poṣadhena teṣāṃ ye te traidhātuke anupaliptāḥ /
T02prmosulu:29: kiṃ poṣadhena teṣāṃ ṣaḍindriyaṃ yehi yehi surakṣitaṃ nityaṃ /
T02prmosulu:31: kāryaṃ ca poṣadhena teṣāṃ ṣaḍindriyaṃ yehi surakṣitaṃ nityaṃ /
T02prmosulu:33: kiṃ poṣadhena teṣām ātmaśīlehi ye hy upavadanti /
T02prmosulu:34: sabrahmacāriṇaś ca śastā devamanuṣyāś ca duḥśīlāḥ //
T02prmosulu:35: kāryaṃ ca poṣadhena teṣāṃ śīlehi nāsti gārhyaṃ /
T02prmosulu:36: sarvatra nopavadyā vijñānāṃ vai sadevake loke // 16-17 //
T02prmosulu:37: kiṃ poṣadhena teṣāṃ virāgitaṃ śāstuḥ śāsanaṃ yehi /
T02prmosulu:38: āsevitā ca yehi vipattīyo pañca cāpattīḥ //
T02prmosulu:39: kāryaṃ ca poṣadhena teṣāṃ yuktānāṃ śāsane daśabalasya /
T02prmosulu:41: yeṣāṃ ca vasati hṛdaye śāstā dharmo gaṇottamo /
T02prmosulu:42: śikṣā uddeśo saṃvāso saṃbhogo śāstuno vacanaṃ //
T02prmosulu:44: paricarya dharmarājaṃ te yānti asaṃskṛtaṃ sthānaṃ // 20-21 //
T02prmosulu:45: śuddhasya vai sadā phalguḥ sadā śuddhasya poṣadho /
T02prmosulu:48: tāvat sthāsyati saddharmo sāmagrī ca gaṇottame // 23 //
T02prmosulu:49: yāvac ca deśayitāraḥ pratipattāraś ca dharmaratnasya /
T02prmosulu:51: tasmāt samagrāḥ sahitāḥ sagauravāḥ bhaviyā anyamanyaṃ paricaratha /
T02prmosulu:52: dharmarājam adhigacchatha nirvāṇam atandritā acyutam padam aśokam iti //
T02prmosulu:54: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Einl. abhikrāntāḥ suvihitāḥ śuddhā nipuṇā anusaṅgāyanto upaniṣaṇṇā, cāritāḥ śalākā, gaṇitā bhikḥū sīmāprāptā ettakā janāḥ /
T02prmosulu:55: anāgatānām āyuḥmanto bhikḥūṇāṃ cchandapāriśuddhim ārocettha, ārocitaṃ ca prativedetha /
T02prmosulu:56: ko bhikḥu bhikḥuṇīnāṃ cchandahārako? nāsti cātra kaścid
T02prmosulu:60: arhantaghātako, nāsti saṃghabhedako, nāsti tathāgatasya duḥṭacittarudhirotpādako /
T02prmosulu:66: tad evaṃ samanvāharantu bhagavato śrāvakāṇāṃ nityaviśuddhānāṃ pariśuddhaśīlānāṃ /
T02prmosulu:67: śṛṇotu me bhante saṃgho Ō adya saṃghasya cāturdaśiko vā sandhipoṣadho vā viśuddhinakṣatraṃ
T02prmosulu:70: kiṃ saṃghasya pūrvakṛtyaṃ? alpakṛtyo bhagavataḥ śrāvakasaṃgho so bhavati /
T02prmosulu:71: śṛṇotu me bhante saṃgho Ō adya saṃghasya pāñcadaśiko poṣadho viśuddhinakṣatraṃ /
T02prmosulu:72: yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ saṃgho imasmin pṛthivīpradeśe yāvatakaṃ bhikṣusaṃghenābhigṛhītaṃ samantanavyāmamātraṃ atrāntare pāñcadaśikaṃ poṣadhaṃ kuryāt prātimokṣaṃ ca sūtram uddiśeyyā ovayikā eṣā jñaptiḥ /
T02prmosulu:73: kariṣyati bhante saṃgho imasmin pṛthivīpradeśe yāvatakaṃ bhikṣusaṃghenābhigṛhītaṃ samantanavyāmamātram atrāntare pāñcadaśikaṃ poṣadhaṃ prātimokṣaṃ ca sūtram uddiśiṣyati /
T02prmosulu:74: kṣamate taṃ saṃghasya, yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi /
T02prmosulu:75: abhimukhaṃ krāmati jarāmaraṇaṃ kṣīyati jīvitendriyaṃ, hāyati saddharmo astameti dharmolko, nirvāyanti deśayitāraḥ, parīttā bhavanti pratipattāraḥ
T02prmosulu:77: girinadījalacapalacañcalopamā āyuḥ saṃskārā muhūrttam api nāvatiṣṭhante /
T02prmosulu:79: tat kasya hetoḥ? apramādādhigatānāṃ hi tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ bodhiḥ /
T02prmosulu:82: daśārthavaśān sampaśyamānās tathāgatārhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ śrāvakāṇām adhiśīlaṃ śikṣāpadaṃ
T02prmosulu:86: (4) peśalānāṃ ca bhikṣūṇāṃ phāsuvihārāya (5) aprasannānāṃ prasādāya (6)
T02prmosulu:87: prasannānāṃ ca bhūyobhāvāya dṛṣṭadhārmikāṇām āśravāṇāṃ nirghātāya (8)
T02prmosulu:88: samparāyikāṇām āśravāṇām āyatyām ananuśravaṇatāya (9) yathemaṃ syāt prāvacanaṃ cirasthitikaṃ (10) bāhujanyaṃ vivṛtaṃ suprakāśitaṃ yāvad devamanuṣyeṣv iti /
T02prmosulu:89: imān daśārthavaśān saṃpaśyamānās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhāḥ śrāvakāṇām adhiśīlaṃ śikṣāpadaṃ prajñāpayanti prātimokṣaṃ ca sūtram uddiśanti /
T02prmosulu:91: taṃ śṛṇuta sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta /
T02prmosulu:93: yasya vo siyāpattiḥ so 'viṣkarotu, asantīye āpattīye tūṣṇīṃ bhavitavyaṃ /
T02prmosulu:94: tūṣṇīmbhāvena kho punar āyuṣmanto pariśuddhā iti vedayiṣyāmi /
T02prmosulu:95: yathā kho punar āyuṣmanto pratyekaṃ pratyekaṃ pṛcchitasya bhikṣusya vyākaraṇaṃ bhavati evam eva rūpāye bhikṣuparṣāye yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanuśrāvayiṣyati /
T02prmosulu:96: yo puna bhikṣu evaṃrūpāye bhikṣuparṣāye yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanuśrāviyamāṇo smaramāṇo santīm āpattiṃ nāviṣkaroti saṃprajānamṛṣāvādo se bhavati /
T02prmosulu:97: saṃprajānamṛṣāvādo kho punar āyuṣmanto āntarāyiko dharmo ukto bhagavatā /
T02prmosulu:98: tasmāt smaramāṇena bhikṣuṇā āpannena viśuddhiprekṣeṇa santī āpattī āviṣkartavyā /
T02prmosulu:99: āviṣkṛtvā ca se phāsu bhavati, no anāviṣkṛtvā /
T02prmosulu:102: ime kho punar āyuṣmanto catvāraḥ pārājikā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddeśam āgacchanti
T02prmosulu:103: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pār.1. yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣūṇāṃ śikṣāsāmīcīsamāpanno śikṣām
T02prmosulu:104: apratyākhyāya daurbalyam anāviṣkṛtvā maithunaṃ grāmyadharmaṃ pratiṣeveya antamaśato tiryagyonigatāyam api sādham ayaṃ bhikṣuḥ pārājiko bhavaty asaṃvāsyo, na labhate bhikṣūhi sārdhasaṃvāsaṃ idaṃ bhagavatā veśālīyaṃ śikṣāpadaṃ prajñaptaṃ pañcavarṣābhisaṃbuddhena hemantapakṣe pañcame, divase dvādaśame, purebhaktam uttarāmukhaniṣaṇṇena dvyardhapauruṣāyāṃ cchāyāyāṃ, āyuṣmantaṃ yaśikaṃ kalandakaputram ārabhya /
T02prmosulu:105: imasya ca śikṣāpadasya prajñaptir dharmo, yathāpraṇihitasya ca yā
T02prmosulu:107: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pār.2. yo puna bhikṣu grāmād vā araṇyād vā adinnam anyātakaṃ
T02prmosulu:108: stainasaṃskāram ādiyeya yathārūpeṇādinnādānena [rā]jāno gṛhītvā haneṃsu vā
T02prmosulu:109: bandheṃsu vā pravrājeṃsu vā hambho puruṣa coro 'si bālo 'si mūḍho 'si
T02prmosulu:110: stainyo 'sīti vā vadeṃsu, tathārūpaṃ bhikṣur adinnam ādiyamāno ayam pi
T02prmosulu:111: bhikṣuḥ pārājiko bhavaty asaṃvāsyo, na labhate bhikṣūhi sārdhasaṃvāsaṃ /
T02prmosulu:112: idaṃ bhagavatā rājagṛhe śikṣāpadaṃ prajñaptaṃ ṣaḍvarṣābhisambuddhena hemantapakṣe dvitī[ye, di]vase navame, paścādbhaktaṃ purastān mukhaniṣaṇṇena aḍḍhātīyapauruṣāyāṃ cchāyāyām āyuṣmantaṃ dhanikaṃ kumbhakārajātīyam ārabhya rājānaṃ ca śreṇīyaṃ bimbasāraṃ pāṃsukūlikaṃ ca bhikṣaṃ imasya ca śikṣāpadasya prajñaptir dharmo yathāpraṇihitasya ca yā anuvartanatā ayam ucyate anudharmo /
T02prmosulu:113: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pār.3. yo puna bhikṣuḥ svahastaṃ manuṣyavigrahaṃ jīvitād
T02prmosulu:114: vyaparopeya śastrahārakaṃ vāsya paryeṣeya, maraṇāya cainaṃ samādāpeya,
T02prmosulu:115: maraṇavarṇaṃ vāsya saṃvarṇeya Ō hambho puruṣa kiṃ te iminā pāpakena durjīvitena dhigjīvitena, mṛtaṃ te jīvitāc chreyo Ō iti cittam alaṃ cittasaṃkalpam anekaparyāyeṇa maraṇāya vainaṃ samādāpeya maraṇavarṇaṃ
T02prmosulu:116: vāsya saṃvarṇeya, so ca puruṣo tenopakrameṇa kālaṃ kuryān nānyena, ayaṃ pi bhikṣuḥ pārājiko bhavaty asaṃvāsyo, na labhate bhikṣūhi sārdhasaṃvāsaṃ /
T02prmosulu:117: idaṃ bhagavatā veśālīyaṃ śikṣāpadaṃ prajñaptaṃ ṣaḍvarṣābhisambuddhena hemantapakṣe tṛtīye, divase daśame, paścādbhaktaṃ purastān mukhaniṣaṇṇena
T02prmosulu:118: aḍḍhātīyapauruṣāyāṃ cchāyāyāṃ sambahulān gilānopasthāpakān bhikṣūn ārabhya mṛgadaṇḍikaṃ ca parivrājakaṃ /
T02prmosulu:120: yathāpraṇihitasya ca yā anuvartanatā ayam ucyate anudharmo /
T02prmosulu:121: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pār.4. yo puna bhikṣur anabhijānann aparijānann ātmopanāyikam
T02prmosulu:122: uttarimanuṣyadharmam alamāryajñānadarśanaṃ viśeṣādhigamaṃ prātajāneya ita jānāmi ita paśyāmīti
T02prmosulu:123: so tad apareṇa samayena samanugrāhiyamāṇo vā
T02prmosulu:124: asa[ma]nugrāhiyamāṇo vā āpanno viśuddhiprekṣo evam avaci Ō ajānann evāham āyuṣmanto avaci jānāmi, apaśyan paśyāmīti /
T02prmosulu:126: anyatrābhimānāt* ayaṃ pi bhikṣuḥ pārājiko bhavaty asaṃvāsyo na labhate bhikṣūhi sārdhasaṃvāsaṃ
T02prmosulu:127: idaṃ bhagavatā śrāvastīyaṃ śikṣāpadaṃ prajñaptaṃ ṣaḍvarṣābhisambuddhena hemantapakṣe caturthe, divase trayodaśame, purebhaktaṃ uttarāmukhaniṣaṇṇena aḍḍhucchapauruṣāyāṃ cchāyāyāṃ saṃbahulān grāmavāsikān
T02prmosulu:130: dharmo, yathā praṇihitasya ca yā anuvartanatā ayam ucyate anudharmo /
T02prmosulu:132: (1) maithunam (2) adinnādānaṃ (3) vadho manuṣyavigrahasyā- (4) bhūtena cottarimanuṣyadharmaṃ pratijānātīti /
T02prmosulu:133: uddiṣṭāḥ kho punar āyuṣmanto catvāraḥ pārājikā dharmāḥ /
T02prmosulu:135: 'nyatarām āpattim āpadyitvā pārājiko bhavaty asaṃvāsyo na labhate bhikṣūhi sārdhasaṃvāsaṃ
T02prmosulu:136: yathā pūrve tathā paścād yathā paścāt tathā pūrve pārājiko bhavaty asaṃvāsyo na labhate bhikṣūhi saṃvāsaṃ ḥ tatrāyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ? dvitīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ? tṛtīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ?
T02prmosulu:137: pariśuddhātrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi ḥ
T02prmosulu:139: ime kho punar āyuṣmanto trayodaśa saṃghātiśeṣā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddeśam āgacchanti /
T02prmosulu:140: PrMoSū(Mā-L)SA.1. saṃcetanikāye śukrasya visṛṣṭīye anyatra svapnāntare saṃghātiśeṣo /
T02prmosulu:141: PrMoSū(Mā-L)SA.2. yo puna bhikṣu otīrṇo vipariṇatena cittena mātṛgrāmeṇa sārdhaṃ kāyasaṃsargaṃ samāpadyeya saṃyathīdaṃ hastagrahaṇaṃ vā veṇīgrahaṇaṃ vā anyatarānyatarasya vā punar aṅgajātasya āmoṣaṇaparāmoṣaṇaṃ sādiyeya saṃghātiśeṣo /
T02prmosulu:142: PrMoSū(Mā-L)SA.3. yo puna bhikṣu otīrṇo vipariṇatena cittena mātṛgrāmaṃ duṣṭhullāya vācāya obhāṣeya pāpikāya maithunopasaṃhitāya saṃyathīdaṃ yuvāṃ yuvatīti saṃghātiśeṣo /
T02prmosulu:143: PrMoSū(Mā-L)SA.4. yo puna bhikṣu otīrṇo vipariṇatena cittena mātṛgrāmasya antike ātmikāye paricaryāye varṇaṃ bhāṣeya Ō etad agraṃ bhagini paricaryāṇāṃ yā mādṛśaṃ śramaṇaṃ śīlavantaṃ kalyāṇadharmaṃ brahmacāriṃ etena dharmeṇa upasthiheya paricareya yaduta maithunopasaṃhiteneti
T02prmosulu:145: PrMoSū(Mā-L)SA.5. yo puna bhikṣuḥ saṃcaritraṃ samāpadyeya istriyāye mataṃ puruṣasyopasaṃhareya puruṣasya vā mataṃ istriyāye upasaṃhareya jāyattanena vā jārtanena vā antamaśato tatkṣaṇikāyām api saṃghātiśeṣo /
T02prmosulu:146: PrMoSū(Mā-L)SA.6. svayaṃ yācikāya bhikṣuṇā kuṭī kārayamāṇena asvāmikātmoddeśikā kuṭī kārāpayitavyā
T02prmosulu:147: tatredaṃ pramāṇaṃ Ō dīrghaśo dvādaśa vitastīyo sugatavitastinā /
T02prmosulu:152: sāraṃbhe ced bhikṣu vastusminn aparikramaṇe svayaṃyācikāya kuṭīṃ kārāpeya asvāmikām ātmoddeśikāṃ bhikṣūn vā nābhineya vastudesanāya, pramāṇaṃ vā atikrameya, adeśite vastusminn aparikramaṇe
T02prmosulu:154: PrMoSū(Mā-L)SA.7. mahālakaṃ bhikṣuṇā vihāraṃ [kārā]payamāṇena sasvāmikam ātmoddeśikaṃ bhikṣū cānenābhinetavyā vastudeśanāya /
T02prmosulu:157: sāraṃbhe ced bhikṣu vastusminn aparikramaṇe mahallakaṃ vihāraṃ kārāpeya sasvāmikam ātmoddeśikaṃ bhikṣūn vā nābhineya vastudeśanāya, adeśite vastusminn aparikramaṇe saṃghātiśeṣo /
T02prmosulu:158: PrMoSū(Mā-L)SA.8. yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣusya duṣṭo, doṣāt kupito, anāttamano śuddhaṃ bhikṣum anāpattikam amūlakena pārājikena dharmeṇa anudhvaṃseya apy
T02prmosulu:159: evaṃ nāma imaṃ bhikṣuṃ brahmacaryāto cyāveyaṃ ti, so tad apareṇa samayena samanugrāhiyamāṇo vā asamanugrāhiyamāṇo vā amūlakam eva tam adhikaraṇaṃ
T02prmosulu:161: amūlakasya ca adhikaraṇasya ca adharmo upādinno bhavati, bhikṣu ca doṣe pratiṣṭhihati doṣād avacāmīti saṃghātiśeṣo /
T02prmosulu:162: PrMoSū(Mā-L)SA.9. yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣusya duṣṭo, doṣāt kupito, anāttamano anyabhāgīyasyādhikaraṇasya kiñcid eva leśamātrakaṃ dharmam upādāya aparājikaṃ bhikṣuṃ pārājikena dharmeṇa anudhvaṃseya apy eva nāma imaṃ bhikṣuṃ brahmacaryāto cyāveyaṃ ti, so tad apareṇa samayena samanugrāhiyamāṇo vā asamanugrāhiyamāṇo vā anyabhāgīyam eva tam adhikaraṇaṃ bhavati, anyabhāgīyasya cādhikaraṇasya kocid e[va] leśamātrako dharmo upādinno bhavati, bhikṣu ca doṣe pratiṣṭhihati doṣād avacāmīti
T02prmosulu:164: PrMoSū(Mā-L)SA.10. yo puna bhikṣuḥ samagrasya saṃghasya bhedāya
T02prmosulu:165: parākrameya bhedanasaṃvartanīyaṃ vādhikaraṇaṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheya,
T02prmosulu:166: so bhikṣu bhikṣūhi evam asya vacanīyo Ō mā āyuṣman samagrasya saṃghasya bhedāya parākramehi, bhedanasaṃvartanīyaṃ vā adhikaraṇaṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭhāhi /
T02prmosulu:167: sametu āyuṣmān sārdhaṃ saṃghena, samagro hi saṃgho sahito sammodamāno avivadamāno ekuddeśo kṣīrodakībhūto śāstuḥ śāsanaṃ dīpayamāno sukhaṃ ca phāsuṃ ca viharati /
T02prmosulu:168: evaṃ ca so bhikṣu bhikṣūhi vucyamāno taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareya ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ /
T02prmosulu:169: no ca pratinissareya, so bhikṣu bhikṣūhi yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyo samanubhāṣitavyo tasya vastusya
T02prmosulu:171: yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇo vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇo vā taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareya ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ /
T02prmosulu:172: no ca pratinissareya tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheya saṃghātiśeṣo /
T02prmosulu:173: PrMoSū(Mā-L)SA.11. tasya kho puna bhikṣusya bhikṣū sahāyakā bhonti eko vā,
T02prmosulu:174: dvau vā trayo vā saṃbahulā vā, vargavādakā anuvartakāḥ samanujñāḥ
T02prmosulu:176: te bhikṣū tān bhikṣūn evaṃ vadeṃsu Ō mā āyuṣmanto etaṃ bhikṣuṃ kiñcid vadatha kalyāṇaṃ vā pāpakaṃ vā /
T02prmosulu:178: vina[ya]vādī caiṣo bhikṣu, asmākaṃ caiṣo bhikṣu cchandaṃ ca ruciṃ ca samādāya pragṛhya vyavaharati
T02prmosulu:179: yaṃ caitasya bhikṣusya kṣamate ca rocate ca asmākam api taṃ kṣamate ca rocate ca /
T02prmosulu:180: jānan caiṣo bhikṣu bhāṣate no ajānan /
T02prmosulu:181: te bhikṣu bhikṣūhi evam asya vacanīyā Ō mā āyuṣmanto evaṃ
T02prmosulu:182: vadatha, na eṣo bhikṣur dharmavādī, na eṣo bhikṣur vinayavādī, adharmavādī caiṣo bhikṣu, avinayavādī caiṣo bhikṣu, ajānan* caiṣo bhikṣu bhāṣate no
T02prmosulu:184: mā āyuṣmanto saṃghabhedaṃ rocentu, saṃghasāmagrīm evāyuṣmanto rocentu /
T02prmosulu:186: samagro hi sahito sammodamāno avivadamāno ekuddeśo kṣīrodakībhūto śāstuḥ śāsanaṃ dīpayamāno sukhaṃ ca phāsuṃ ca viharati /
T02prmosulu:187: evaṃ ca te bhikṣū bhikṣūhi vucyamānās taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareṃsu ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ, no ca pratinissareṃsu te bhikṣū bhikṣūhi yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyāḥ samanubhāṣitavyāḥ tasya vastusya
T02prmosulu:189: yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareṃsu i[ty e]taṃ kuśalaṃ, no ca pratinissareṃsu tam eva ca vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheṃsu saṃghātiśeṣo PrMoSū(Mā-L)SA.12. bhikṣuḥ kho puna durvacakajātīyo bhoti /
T02prmosulu:190: so uddeśaparyāpannehi śikṣāpadehi bhikṣūhi śikṣāyāṃ saha dharmeṇa saha vinayena vucyamāno ātmānam avacanīyaṃ karoti /
T02prmosulu:191: so evam āha Ō mā me āyuṣmanto kiñcid vadatha kalyāṇaṃ vā pāpakaṃ vā /
T02prmosulu:192: aham apy āyuṣmantānāṃ na kiñcid vakṣyāmi kalyāṇaṃ vā pāpakaṃ vā /
T02prmosulu:194: so bhikṣu bhikṣūhi evam asya vacanīyo Ō mā āyuṣmann uddeśaparyāpannehi śikṣāpadehi bhikṣūhi śikṣāyāṃ saha dharmeṇa saha vinayena vucyamāno ātmānam avacanīyaṃ karohi /
T02prmosulu:196: bhikṣū pi āyuṣmantaṃ vakṣyanti śikṣāyāṃ saha dharmeṇa saha vina[yena] /
T02prmosulu:197: āyuṣmān api bhikṣūn vadatu śikṣāyāṃ saha dharmeṇa saha vinayena /
T02prmosulu:198: evaṃ saṃbaddhā kho punas tasya bhagavato tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksambuddhasya parṣā yad idam anyamanyasya vacanīyā, anyonyāpatti vyutthāpanīyā /
T02prmosulu:199: evaṃ ca so bhikṣū bhikṣūhi vucyamāno taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareya ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ, no ca pratinissareya so bhikṣu bhikṣūhi yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyo
T02prmosulu:201: yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇo vā taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareya ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ, no ca pratinissareya tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheya saṃghātiśeṣo /
T02prmosulu:202: PrMoSū(Mā-L)SA. saṃbahulā bhikṣū kho punar anyataraṃ grāmam vā nagaraṃ vā
T02prmosulu:203: nigamaṃ vā upaniśrāya viharanti kuladūṣakāḥ pāpasamācārāḥ /
T02prmosulu:204: teṣāṃ te pāpakāḥ samācārā dṛśyante ca śrūyante ca /
T02prmosulu:205: kulāny api duṣṭāni dṛśyante ca śrūyante ca /
T02prmosulu:207: te bhikṣū bhikṣūhi evam asya vacanīyāḥ Ō āyuṣmantānāṃ khalu pāpakāḥ samācārāḥ dṛśyante ca śrūyante ca /
T02prmosulu:208: kulāny api duṣṭāni dṛśyante ca śrūyante ca /
T02prmosulu:210: prakramathāyuṣmanto imasmād āvāsād alaṃ vo iha vustena /
T02prmosulu:211: evaṃ ca te bhikṣū bhikṣūhi vucyamānās te bhikṣū tān bhikṣūn evaṃ vadeṃsu Ō cchandagāmī cāyuṣmanto doṣagāmī cāyuṣmanto saṃgho, mohagāmī cāyuṣmanto saṃgho, bhayagāmī cāyuṣmanto saṃgho, saṃgho ca tāhi tādṛśikāhi āpattīhi ekatyān bhikṣūn pravrājeti ekatyān bhikṣūn na pravrājeti /
T02prmosulu:212: te bhikṣū bhikṣūhi evam asya vacanīyāḥ Ō mā āyuṣmanto evaṃ vadatha /
T02prmosulu:213: na saṃgho cchandagāmī, na saṃgho doṣagāmī, na saṃgho mohagāmī, na saṃgho bhayagāmī /
T02prmosulu:214: na ca saṃgho tāhi tādṛśikāhi āpattīhi ekatyān bhikṣūn pravrājeti, ekatyān bhikṣūn na pravrājeti
T02prmosulu:215: āyuṣmantānām eva khalu pāpakāḥ samācārāḥ dṛśyante ca śrūyante ca /
T02prmosulu:216: kulāny api duṣṭāni dṛśyante ca śrūyante ca /
T02prmosulu:218: prakramathāyuṣmanto imasmād āvāsād alaṃ vo iha vustena /
T02prmosulu:219: evaṃ ca te bhikṣū bhikṣūhi vucyamānā taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareṃsu ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ /
T02prmosulu:220: no ca pratinissareṃsu te bhikṣū bhikṣūhi yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyā samanubhāṣitavyās tasya vastusya pratinissargāya /
T02prmosulu:221: yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇā vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇā vā taṃ vastuṃ
T02prmosulu:223: no ca pratinissareṃsu tam eva vastuṃ samādāya pragṛhya tiṣṭheṃsu saṃghātiśeṣo /
T02prmosulu:226: saṃcaritraṃ (6) kuṭīṃ (7) vihāro (8-9) dve cābhūtena (10) saṃghasya ca bhedāyopakrāmati
T02prmosulu:228: uddiṣṭā kho punar āyuṣmanto trayodaśa saṃghātiśeṣā dharmāḥ /
T02prmosulu:229: tatra nava prathamāpattikāś catvāro yāvantṛtīyakā, yeṣāṃ bhikṣur ato 'nyatarām
T02prmosulu:230: āpattim āpadyitvā yāvatakaṃ jānan* cchādeti tāvatakaṃ tena bhikṣuṇā akāmaparivāsaṃ parivasitavyaṃ
T02prmosulu:231: parivustaparivāsena bhikṣuṇā uttariṣaḍāhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghe mānatvaṃ caritavyaṃ /
T02prmosulu:232: cīrṇamānatvo bhikṣuḥ kṛtānudharmo āhvayanapratibaddho yatra syād viṃśagaṇo bhikṣusaṃgho tatra so bhikṣu āhvayitavyo /
T02prmosulu:233: ekabhikṣuṇāpi ced ūnoviṃśatigaṇo bhikṣusaṃgho taṃ bhikṣum
T02prmosulu:234: āhveya, so ca bhikṣu anāhūto te ca bhikṣū garhyāḥ /
T02prmosulu:236: tatrāyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ? dvitīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto
T02prmosulu:237: pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ? tṛtīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ? pariśuddhā atrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi /
T02prmosulu:239: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Aniy. ime kho punar āyuṣmanto duve aniyatā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddeśam āgacchanti Ō
T02prmosulu:240: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Aniy.1. yo puna bhikṣu mātṛgrāmeṇa sārdhaṃ praticchannāsane
T02prmosulu:241: alaṃkarmaṇīye eko [ekā]ya raho niṣadyāṃ kalpeya, tam enaṃ śraddheyavacasā
T02prmosulu:242: upāsikā dṛṣṭvā trayāṇāṃ dharmāṇām anyatarānyatareṇa dharmeṇa vadeya pārājikena vā saṃghātiśeṣeṇa vā pācattikena vā /
T02prmosulu:243: niṣadyāṃ bhikṣuḥ pratijānamāno trayāṇāṃ dharmāṇām anyatarānyatareṇa dharmeṇa kārāpayitavyo pārājikena vā saṃghātiśeṣeṇa vā pācattikena vā yena yena vā punar asya śraddheyavacasā upāsikā dṛṣṭvā dharmeṇa vadeya, tena so bhikṣu dharmeṇa kārāpayitavyo /
T02prmosulu:245: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Aniy.2. na haiva kho punaḥ praticchannāsanaṃ bhavati, nālaṃ
T02prmosulu:246: karmaṇīyaṃ, alaṃ kho puna mātṛgrāmaṃ duṣṭhullāya vācāya obhāṣituṃ pāpikāya maithunopasaṃhitāya
T02prmosulu:247: tathārūpe ca bhikṣu āsane mātṛgrāmeṇa sārdham eko ekāya raho niṣadyāṃ kalpeya, tam enaṃ śraddheyavacasā upāsikā dṛṣṭvā dvinnāṃ dharmāṇām anyatarānyatareṇa dharmeṇa vadeya saṃghātiśeṣeṇa vā pācattikena vā /
T02prmosulu:248: niṣadyāṃ bhikṣuḥ pratijānamāno dvinnāṃ dharmāṇām anyatarāntareṇa dharmeṇa kārāpayitavyo saṃghātiśeṣeṇa vā pācattikena vā,
T02prmosulu:249: yena yena vā punar asya śraddheyavacasā upāsikā dṛṣṭvā dharmeṇa vadeya,
T02prmosulu:250: tena tena so bhikṣu dharmeṇa kārāpayitavyo /
T02prmosulu:254: uddiṣṭāḥ kho punar āyuṣmanto duve aniyatā dharmāḥ /
T02prmosulu:255: tatrāyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ? dvitīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhā? tṛtīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ?
T02prmosulu:256: pariśuddhā atrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi /
T02prmosulu:258: ime kho punar āyuṣmanto triṃśan nissargikapācattikā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddeśam āgacchanti Ō
T02prmosulu:259: PrMoSū(Mā-L)NP.1. kṛtacīvarehi bhikṣūhi uddhṛtasmin kaṭhine daśāhaparamaṃ bhikṣuṇā atirekacīvaraṃ dhārayitavyaṃ /
T02prmosulu:262: PrMoSū(Mā-L)NP.2. kṛtacīvarehi bhikṣūhi uddhṛtasmin kaṭhine ekarātraṃ pi
T02prmosulu:263: ced bhikṣuḥ trayāṇāṃ cīvarāṇām anyatarānyatareṇa vipravaseya anyatra
T02prmosulu:265: PrMoSū(Mā-L)NP.3. kṛtacīvarehi bhikṣūhi uddhṛtasmin kaṭhine utpadyeya bhikṣusya akālacīvaram ākāṃkṣamāṇena bhikṣuṇā pratigṛhṇitavyaṃ /
T02prmosulu:266: pratigṛhṇitvā kṣipram eva taṃ cīvaraṃ kārāpayitavyaṃ /
T02prmosulu:267: kārāpayato ca tasya bhikṣusya taṃ cīvaraṃ na paripūreya, māsaparamaṃ tena bhikṣuṇā taṃ cīvaraṃ nikṣipitavyaṃ ūnasya pāripūrīye santīye pratyāśāye /
T02prmosulu:268: taduttariṃ nikṣipeya santīye vā asantīye vā pratyāśāye nissargikapācattikaṃ /
T02prmosulu:269: PrMoSū(Mā-L)NP.4. yo puna bhikṣur anyātikāye bhikṣuṇīye cīvaraṃ
T02prmosulu:271: PrMoSū(Mā-L)NP.5. yo puna bhikṣur anyātikāye bhikṣuṇīye purāṇacīvaraṃ
T02prmosulu:272: dhovāpeya vā rañjāpeya vā ākoṭāpeya vā nissargikapācattikaṃ /
T02prmosulu:273: PrMoSū(Mā-L)NP.6. yo puna bhikṣur anyātakaṃ gṛhapatiṃ vā gṛhapatiputraṃ
T02prmosulu:274: [?Śtipatinīṃ] vā cīvaraṃ yāceya anyatra samaye nissargikapācattikaṃ /
T02prmosulu:275: tatrāyaṃ samayo Ō ācchinnacīvaro bhikṣur bhavati /
T02prmosulu:277: PrMoSū(Mā-L)NP.7. ācchinnacīvareṇa bhikṣuṇā kṣamate anyātakaṃ gṛhapatiṃ vā
T02prmosulu:279: tam enam abhihṛṣṭo samāno saṃbahulehi cīvarehi pravāreya, tathāpravāritena bhikṣuṇā sāntarottaraparamaṃ cīvaraṃ sādayitavyaṃ /
T02prmosulu:281: PrMoSū(Mā-L)NP.8. bhikṣuṃ kho punar uddiśya anyatareṣāṃ dvinnāṃ
T02prmosulu:282: gṛhapatikānāṃ cīvaracetāpanāny abhisaṃskṛtāni bhavanti abhisaṃcetayitāni Ō imehi vayaṃ cīvaracetāpanehi civaraṃ cetāpayitvā itthanāmaṃ bhikṣuṃ cīvareṇācchadayiṣyāmaḥ /
T02prmosulu:283: tatra ca bhikṣuḥ pūrvaṃ apravārito upasaṃkramitvā vikalpam āpadyeya Ō sādhu kho puna yūyam āyuṣmanto imehi cīvaracetāpanehi cīvaraṃ cetāpayitvā itthaṃnāmaṃ bhikṣuṃ cīvareṇācchādetha evaṃrūpeṇa vā [evaṃrūpeṇa vā] ubhau pi sahitau ekena kalyāṇakāmatām upādāya /
T02prmosulu:285: PrMoSū(Mā-L)NP.9. bhikṣuṃ kho punar uddiśya anyatareṣāṃ dvinnāṃ
T02prmosulu:286: gṛhapatikasya gṛhapatinīye ca pratyekacīvaracetāpanāni abhisaṃskṛtāni bhavanti, abhisaṃcetayitāni Ō imehi vayaṃ pratyekacīvaracetāpanehi pratyekaṃ pratyekaṃ cīvaraṃ cetāpayitvā itthaṃnāmaṃ bhikṣuṃ pratyekaṃ pratyekaṃ cīvareṇācchadayiṣyāmaḥ /
T02prmosulu:287: tatra ca bhikṣuḥ pūrvaṃ apravārito upasaṃkramitvā vikalpam āpadyeya Ō sādhu kho punas tvam āyuṣman, tvaṃ ca bhagini, imehi pratyekacīvaracetāpanehi pratyekaṃ cīvaraṃ cetāpayitvā itthaṃnāmaṃ bhikṣuṃ pratyekaṃ cīvareṇācchādetha evaṃrūpeṇa vā evaṃrūpeṇa vā ubhau pi sahitau ekena kalyāṇakāmatām upādāya /
T02prmosulu:289: PrMoSū(Mā-L)NP.10. bhikṣuṃ kho punar uddiśya anyataro rājā vā rājabhogyo vā dūtena cīvaracetāpanāni preṣeya /
T02prmosulu:290: so bhikṣus tenopasaṃkramitvā taṃ bhikṣum evaṃ vadeya Ō imāni khalv āryam uddiśya itthaṃnāmena rājñā ca rājabhogyena vā dūtena cīvaracetāpanāni preṣitāni, tāni āryo pratigṛhṇātu
T02prmosulu:291: / tena bhikṣuṇā so dūto evam asya vacanīyo Ō na kho punar āyuṣman kṣamate bhikṣusya cīvaracetāpanāni pratigṛhṇituṃ /
T02prmosulu:292: cīvaraṃ tu vayaṃ pratigṛhṇāmaḥ kālena samayena kalpikaṃ dīyamānaṃ /
T02prmosulu:293: evam ukte so dūto taṃ bhikṣum evaṃ vadeya [sa]nti punar ārya kecid bhikṣūṇāṃ vaiyāpṛtyakarāti
T02prmosulu:294: ākāṃkṣamāṇena bhikṣuṇā santā vaiyāpṛtyakarā vyapadiśitavyāḥ ārāmikā vā /
T02prmosulu:295: ete āyuṣman bhikṣūṇāṃ vaiyāpṛtyakarā ye bhikṣūṇāṃ vaiyāpṛtyaṃ karonti /
T02prmosulu:296: evam ukte so dūto yena vaiyāpṛtyakarās tenopasaṃkramitvā tān vaiyāpṛtyakarān evaṃ vadeya Ō sādhu kho puna yūyam āyuṣmanto vaiyāpṛtyakarā imehi cīvaracetāpanehi cīvaraṃ cetāpayitvā itthaṃnāma bhikṣuṃ cīvareṇācchādetha kālena samayena kalpikenānavadyena /
T02prmosulu:297: so ca dūto tān vaiyāpṛtyakarān saṃjñapayitvā yena so bhikṣus tenopasaṃkramitvā na bhikṣum eva vadeya ye khu te āryeṇa vaiyāpṛtyakarā vyapadiṣṭās te mayā saṃjñaptās tān upasaṃkrameyāmi ācchādayiṣyanti te cīvareṇa kālena samayena kalpikenānavadyena /
T02prmosulu:298: ākāṃkṣamāṇena bhikṣuṇā cīvarārthikena [yena] te vaiyāpṛtyakarās tenopasaṃkramitvā te vaiyāpṛtyakarāḥ sakṛt* dvikkhutto trikkhutto codayitavyā vijñāpayitavyāḥ Ō artho āyuṣmanto bhikṣusya cīvareṇeti sakṛt* dvikkhutto trikkhutto codayanto vijñāpayanto taṃ cīvaram abhiniṣpādeya ity etat kuśalaṃ, no ced abhiniṣpādeya catukkhutto pañcakhutto ṣaṭkhuttoparamaṃ tena bhikṣuṇā tūṣṇībhūtena uddeśe sthātavyaṃ /
T02prmosulu:299: catukkhutto pañcakkhutto ṣaṭkkhuttoparamaṃ tūṣṇībhūto uddeśe tiṣṭhanto taṃ cīvaram abhiniṣpādeya, ity etat kuśalaṃ, no ced abhiniṣpādeya tad uttapanto vā vyāyamanto vā taṃ cīvaram abhiniṣpādeya, abhiniṣpanne cīvare nissargikapācattikaṃ /
T02prmosulu:300: no ced abhiniṣpādeya yena se tāni rājñā vā rājabhogyena vā dūtena cīvaracetāpanāni preṣitāni tatra tena bhikṣuṇā svayaṃ vā gantavyaṃ, dūto vā pratirūpo preṣayitavyo, yāni khu āyuṣmantehi
T02prmosulu:301: itthaṃnāmaṃ bhikṣum uddiśya dūtena cīvaracetāpanāni preṣitāni na khu tāni tasya bhikṣusya kiñcid arthaṃ spharanti, pratyanveṣatha, na svakaṃ dharmo
T02prmosulu:304: (1) daśāhaṃ (2) vipravāso (3) akāle ca (4) pratigraho (5) dhovanā (6)
T02prmosulu:306: (7) sāntarottaraṃ (8-9) dve ca vikalpena (10) rājā ca //
T02prmosulu:308: PrMoSū(Mā-L)NP.11. yo puna bhikṣuḥ śuddhakālakānām eḍakalomānāṃ navaṃ
T02prmosulu:310: PrMoSū(Mā-L)NP.12. navaṃ santhataṃ bhikṣuṇā kārāpayamāṇena śuddhakālakānām eḍakalomānāṃ dve bhāgā ādayitavyās tṛtīyo odātikānāṃ caturtho gocarikāṇāṃ /
T02prmosulu:312: PrMoSū(Mā-L)NP.13. yo puna bhikṣuḥ kauśeyamiśrāṇām eḍakalomānāṃ navaṃ
T02prmosulu:314: PrMoSū(Mā-L)NP.14. navaṃ santhataṃ bhikṣuṇā kārāpayamāṇena akāmaṃ ṣaḍvarṣāṇi dhārayitavyaṃ
T02prmosulu:315: tato ca bhikṣuḥ pratyoreṇa taṃ purāṇaṃ santhataṃ visarjayitvā vā avisarjayitvā vā anyaṃ navaṃ santhataṃ kārāpeya kalyāṇakāmatām upādāya, anyatra namatasaṃmutīye nissargikapācattikaṃ /
T02prmosulu:316: PrMoSū(Mā-L)NP.15. navaṃ santhataniṣīdanaṃ bhikṣuṇā kārāpayamāṇena tato purāṇasanthatāto samantāt sugatavitastinā bhāgo ādayitavyo navasya
T02prmosulu:318: tato ca bhikṣur anādāya navasanthataṃ niṣīdanaṃ kārāpeya nissargikapācattikaṃ /
T02prmosulu:319: PrMoSū(Mā-L)NP.16. bhikṣusya kho punar adhvānamārge pratipannasya utpadyeṃsu e[ḍa]kalomāni
T02prmosulu:321: pratigṛhṇitvā sāmaṃ triyojanaparamaṃ hartavyam asante anyasmi[n] hārake taduttariṃ hāreya sante vā asante vā anyasmi[n] hārake,
T02prmosulu:323: PrMoSū(Mā-L)NP.17. yo puna bhikṣur anyātikāye bhikṣuṇīye eḍakalomādi
T02prmosulu:324: dhovāpeya vā raṃjāpe[ya] vā vivaṭāpaye vā, nissargikapācattikaṃ /
T02prmosulu:325: PrMoSū(Mā-L)NP.18. yo puna bhikṣuḥ svahastaṃ jātarūparajatam udgṛhṇeya vā udgṛhṇāpeya vā antamasato iha nikṣipehīti vā vadeya, upanikṣiptaṃ vā sādiyeya nissargikapācattikaṃ /
T02prmosulu:326: PrMoSū(Mā-L)NP.19. yo puna bhikṣur anekavidhaṃ krayavikrayavyavahāraṃ samāpadyeya saṃyyathīdaṃ imaṃ kriṇa ito kriṇa ettakamettake[na krī]ṇāhīti
T02prmosulu:328: PrMoSū(Mā-L)NP.20. yo puna bhikṣur anekavidhaṃ jātarūparajatavikṛtivyavahāraṃ samāpadyeya nissargikapācattikam //
T02prmosulu:335: PrMoSū(Mā-L)NP.22. yo puna bhikṣu ūnapañcabandhanabaddhena pātreṇa anyaṃ
T02prmosulu:336: navaṃ pātraṃ paryeṣeya kāmātām upādāya, tena bhikṣuṇā taṃ pātraṃ bhikṣuparṣāye nissaritavyaṃ
T02prmosulu:337: yo tahi bhikṣuparṣāye pātraparyanto bhavati so tasya bhikṣusya anupradātavyo Ō evaṃ te āyuṣman pātro dhārayitavyo yāvad bhedanaṃ, nissargikapācattikaṃ /
T02prmosulu:338: PrMoSū(Mā-L)NP.23. yāni kho punar imāni gilānapratiṣevaṇīyāni bhaiṣajyāni
T02prmosulu:339: bhavanti sayyathīdaṃ sarpistailamadhuphāṇitaṃ Ō evaṃrūpāṇi gilānena bhikṣuṇā satkṛtyābhigṛhītāni, kṣamate saptāhaṃ sannidhikāraṃ
T02prmosulu:340: paribhuñjituṃ, santaṃ śeṣaṃ nissaritavyaṃ tad uttaritavyaṃ /
T02prmosulu:341: taduttariṃ khādeya vā bhuṃjeya vā santaṃ vā śeṣabhū[taṃ] nissareya nissargikapācattikaṃ /
T02prmosulu:342: PrMoSū(Mā-L)NP.24. yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣusya cīvaraṃ datvā yathā duṣṭo doṣāt kupito anāttamāno ācchindeya vā ācchindāpayeya vā Ō āhara bhikṣu
T02prmosulu:343: cīvaraṃ, na te 'haṃ demīti vā vadeya, nissargikapācattikaṃ /
T02prmosulu:344: PrMoSū(Mā-L)NP.25. māso śeṣo grīṣmāṇām iti bhikṣuṇā varṣāsāṭikācīvaraṃ
T02prmosulu:348: pra[tyo]reṇa varṣāsāṭikācīvaraṃ paryeṣeya, kṛtvā vā snāpeya,
T02prmosulu:350: PrMoSū(Mā-L)NP.26. yo puna bhikṣuḥ svayaṃyācikāya sūtraṃ tantuvāyena
T02prmosulu:352: PrMoSū(Mā-L)NP.27. bhikṣuṃ kho punar uddiśya anyataro gṛhapatir vā gṛhapatiputro vā tantuvāyena cīvaraṃ vunāpeya, tena ca bhikṣuḥ pūrvaṃ apravārito upasaṃkramitvā vikalpam āpadyeya Ō sādhu kho punas tvam āyuṣmann imaṃ cīvaram āyataṃ ca karohi, vistṛtaṃ ca karohi, suvutaṃ ca karohi, sutacchitaṃ ca karohi, suvilikhitaṃ ca karohi /
T02prmosulu:353: apy eva nāma vayaṃ pi tava kiñcid eva mātrām upasaṃharema, māṣakaṃ vā māṣakārhaṃ vā piṇḍapātaṃ vā piṇḍapātārhaṃ vā /
T02prmosulu:354: tatra ca so bhikṣur evaṃ vaditvā na kiñcid eva mātrām upasaṃhareya māṣakaṃ vā māṣakārhaṃ vā piṇḍapātaṃ vā piṇḍapātārhaṃ vā, abhiniṣpanne cīvare nissargikapācattikaṃ /
T02prmosulu:355: PrMoSū(Mā-L)NP.28. daśāhānāgataṃ kho puna tremāsaṃ kārttikī paurṇamāsī
T02prmosulu:356: utpadyeya bhikṣusya ātyāyikaṃ cīvaram ātyāyikaṃ manyamāno na bhikṣuṇā pratigṛhṇitavyaṃ /
T02prmosulu:359: PrMoSū(Mā-L)NP.29. upavarṣaṃ kho punaḥ tremāsaṃ kārttikī paurṇamāsī bhikṣu cāraṇyake śayanāsane viharanti samaye sapratibhaye sāśaṃkasaṃmate /
T02prmosulu:360: ākāṃkṣamāṇena bhikṣuṇā trayāṇāṃ cīvarāṇām anyatarānyataraṃ cīvaram antaragṛhe nikṣipitavyaṃ, syāt tasya bhikṣusya kocid eva pratyayo tasmāc cīvarād vipravāsāya, ṣaḍāhaparamaṃ tena bhikṣuṇā tasmāc cīvarād vipravasitavyaṃ /
T02prmosulu:361: taduttariṃ vipravaseya anyatra bhikṣu saṃmutīye nissargikapācattikam /
T02prmosulu:362: PrMoSū(Mā-L)NP.30. yo puna bhikṣur jānan sāṃghikāṃ lābhaṃ saṃghe pariṇatam ātmano pariṇāmeya nissargikapācattikam //
T02prmosulu:367: uddiṣṭāḥ kho punar āyuṣmanto triṃśan nissarggikapācattikā dharmmāḥ /
T02prmosulu:368: tatrāyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ? dvitīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto
T02prmosulu:369: pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ? tṛtīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ? pariśuddhā atrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi /
T02prmosulu:371: ime kho punar āyuṣmanto dvānavatiṃ śuddhapācattikā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddeśam āgacchanti Ō
T02prmosulu:375: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.4. yo puna bhikṣur jānaṃ saṃghasyādhikaraṇāni dharmeṇa
T02prmosulu:376: vinayena vihitāni vyupaśāntāni punaḥ karmāya utkhoṭeya Ō idaṃ punaḥ karma kartavyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti Ō etad eva pratyayaṃ kṛtvā ananyam imaṃ tasya bhikṣusya utkhoṭanaṃ pācattikaṃ /
T02prmosulu:377: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.5. yo puna bhikṣur akalpiyakāro mātṛgrāmasya dharmaṃ
T02prmosulu:378: deśeya uttari cchahi pañcahi vācāhi anyatra vijñapuruṣapudgalena pācattikaṃ /
T02prmosulu:379: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.6. yo puna bhikṣur anupasaṃpannaṃ pudgalaṃ padaśo dharmaṃ vāceya pācattikaṃ
T02prmosulu:380: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.7. yo puna bhikṣur anupasaṃpannasya pudgalasya santike
T02prmosulu:381: ātmopanāyikam uttarimanuṣyadharmam alamāryajñānadarśanaṃ viśeṣādhigamaṃ pratijāneya Ō iti jānāmi iti paśyāmīti bhūtasmiṃ pācattikaṃ /
T02prmosulu:382: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.8. yo puna bhikṣur jānan bhikṣusya duṣṭhullām āpattim anupasaṃpannasya pudgalasya santike āroceya anyatra kṛtāye prakāśanāsaṃmutīye pācattikaṃ /
T02prmosulu:383: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.9. yo puna bhikṣur jānan sāṃghike lābhe bhājīyamāne pūrve samanujño bhūtvā paścāt kṣiyādharmam āpadyeya Ō yathāsaṃstutam
T02prmosulu:384: evāyuṣmanto, jānan sāṃghikaṃ lābhaṃ saṃghe pariṇataṃ pudgalo pudgalasya pariṇāmayatīti pācattikaṃ
T02prmosulu:385: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.10. yo puna bhikṣur anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe
T02prmosulu:386: uddiśyamāne evaṃ vadeya Ō kiṃ punar āyuṣmanto imehi kṣudrānukṣūdrehi śikṣāpadehi uddiṣṭehi yāvad eva bhikṣūṇāṃ kaukṛtyāya vighātāya vilekhāya saṃvartantīti, śikṣāvigarhaṇe pācattikaṃ // uddānam //
T02prmosulu:388: padaśo (7) viśeṣaṇam (8) ārocanā (9) yathāsaṃstuta (10) vigarhaṇena ca //
T02prmosulu:393: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.14. yo puna bhikṣuḥ sāṃghike bhikṣuvihāre abhyavakāśe
T02prmosulu:394: mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā viśikaṃ vā caturaśrakaṃ vā kurcaṃ vā bimbohanaṃ vā prajñāpetvā vā prajñāpayitvā vā tato prakramanto na uddhareya vā, na uddharāpeya vā, anāmantrayitvā vā prakrameya pācattikaṃ PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.15. yo punar bhikṣuḥ sāṃghike bhikṣuvihāre antośayyāṃ
T02prmosulu:395: prajñāpetvā prajñāpayitvā vā tato prakramanto na uddhareya vā, na uddharāpeya vā, anāmantrayitvā vā prakrameya pācattikaṃ /
T02prmosulu:396: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.16. yo punar bhikṣu bhikṣusya duṣṭo doṣāt kupito anāttamano sāṃghikād bhikṣuvihārād bhikṣuṃ nikaḍḍheya vā nikaḍḍhāpeya vā
T02prmosulu:397: antamasato neha bhikṣū ti vā vadeya pācattikaṃ /
T02prmosulu:398: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.17. yo puna bhikṣu sāṃghike bhikṣuvihāre jānan bhikṣūṇāṃ pūrvaprajñaptāhi śayyāhi paścād āgatvā madhyeśayyāṃ prajñāpeya yasyodvahiṣyati so prakramiṣyatīti /
T02prmosulu:399: etad eva pratyayaṃ kṛtvā, ananyam imaṃ tasya bhikṣusya udvāhanapācattikaṃ /
T02prmosulu:400: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.18. yo puna bhikṣuḥ sāṃghike bhikṣuvihāre upari
T02prmosulu:401: vaihāyasakuṭikāye āhatya pādake mañce vā pīṭhe vā abhiniṣīdeya vā abhinipadyeya vā pācattikaṃ
T02prmosulu:402: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.19. yo puna bhikṣur jānan saprāṇakenodakena tṛṇaṃ vā mṛttikāṃ vā siñceya vā siñcāpeya vā pācattikaṃ /
T02prmosulu:403: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.20. mahallakaṃ bhikṣuṇā vihāraṃ chādāpayamānena yāvad dvārakoṣārgalapratiṣṭhānam ālokasandhiparikarmam upādāya dve vā trayo vā cchādanaparyāyā adhiṣṭhihitavyāḥ alpaharite sthitena /
T02prmosulu:404: taduttariṃ adhiṣṭhiheya alpaharite sthito pi pācattikaṃ /
T02prmosulu:410: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.21. yo puna bhikṣu asaṃmato bhikṣuṇīm ovadeya pācattikaṃ /
T02prmosulu:411: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.22. saṃmato vāpi bhikṣuḥ bhikṣūṇīm ovadeya vikāle,
T02prmosulu:413: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.23. yo puna bhikṣu ovādaprekṣo bhikṣuṇīupāśrayam upasaṃkrameya santaṃ bhikṣum anāmantrayitvā, anyatra samaye pācattikaṃ /
T02prmosulu:414: tatrāyaṃ samayo Ō gilānā bhikṣuṇī ovaditavyā anuśāsitavyā bhavati /
T02prmosulu:416: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.24. yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣum evaṃ vadeya Ō āmiṣahetor āyuṣman bhikṣu bhikṣuṇīṃ te ovadatīti pācattikaṃ /
T02prmosulu:417: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.25. yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣuṇīya sārdham eko ekāya raho niṣadyāṃ kalpeya pācattikaṃ
T02prmosulu:418: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.26. yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣuṇīya sārdhaṃ saṃvidhāya
T02prmosulu:419: adhvānamārgaṃ pratipadyeya antamasato grāmāntaraṃ pi, anyatra samaye,
T02prmosulu:421: tatrāyaṃ samayo Ō mārgo bhavati sabhayo sapratibhayo sāśaṃkasaṃmato /
T02prmosulu:423: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.27. yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣuṇīya sārdhaṃ saṃvidhāya ekanāvāṃ abhiruheya ūrdhvagāminīṃ vā adhogāminīṃ vā, anyatra tiryottaraṇāya pācattikaṃ /
T02prmosulu:424: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.28. yo puna bhikṣu anyātikāye bhikṣuṇīye cīvaraṃ dadyād anyatra pallaṭṭhakena pācattikaṃ /
T02prmosulu:425: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.29. yo puna bhikṣur anyātikāye bhikṣuṇīye cīvaraṃ sīveya vā sīvāpeya vā pācattikaṃ
T02prmosulu:426: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.30. yo puna bhikṣur jānan bhikṣuṇīparipācitaṃ pinḍapātaṃ
T02prmosulu:429: (21) asaṃmato (22) saṃmato cāpi (23) ovādo (24) āmiṣaṃ (25) niṣadyā ca /
T02prmosulu:430: (26) adhvānamārgo (27) nāvā ca (28) deti (29) sīveti (30) paripācanena //
T02prmosulu:437: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.33. yo puna bhikṣur bhuṃjāvī pravārito utthito āsanāto,
T02prmosulu:438: anatiriktaṃ kṛtaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā khādeya vā bhuṃjeya vā pācattikaṃ /
T02prmosulu:439: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.34. yo puna bhikṣur jānan bhikṣu bhuktāvī pravāritam utthitam āsanāto āsādanāprekṣo anatiriktakṛtena khādanīyena vā bhojanīyena vā upanimantreya, ehi bhikṣu khādāhi bhuṃjāhīti vā vadeya bhuktasmiṃ pācattikaṃ /
T02prmosulu:440: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.35. yo puna bhikṣur adinnam apratigrāhitaṃ mukhadvārikam
T02prmosulu:444: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.38. bhikṣuṃ kho punaḥ kulehi upasaṃkrāntaṃ pravāreṃsu
T02prmosulu:448: bahirdhā nīharitvā agilānakehi bhikṣūhi sārdhaṃ saṃvibhajitvā khāditavyaṃ bhuṃjitavyaṃ /
T02prmosulu:449: taduttariṃ pratigṛhṇitvā bahirdhā nīharitvā agilānakehi bhikṣūhi sārdhaṃ saṃvibhajitvā vā asaṃvibhajitvā vā khādeya vā bhuṃjeya vā pācattikaṃ /
T02prmosulu:450: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.39. yāni kho punar imāni praṇītasaṃmatāni bhojanāni
T02prmosulu:451: bhavanti saṃyyathīdaṃ sarpistailaṃ madhu phāṇitaṃ dugdhaṃ dadhi matsyaṃ māṃsaṃ yo puna bhikṣur evaṃrūpāṇi praṇītasaṃmatāni bhojanāni ātmārthāya agilāno kulehi vijñapetvā vā vijñāpāyetvā vā khādeya vā bhuṃjeya vā pācattikaṃ /
T02prmosulu:453: tatrāyaṃ samayo Ō gilānasamayo cīvaradānakālasamayo adhvānagamanasamayo nāvābhirohaṇasamayo mahāsamayo śravaṇabhaktaṃ /
T02prmosulu:459: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.41. yo puna bhikṣur ātmārthāya agilāno jyotismiṃ
T02prmosulu:460: vitāpanāprekṣo tṛṇaṃ vā kāṣṭhaṃ vā gomayaṃ vā sakalikāṃ vā tuṣaṃ vā saṃkāraṃ vā ādaheya vā ādahāpeya vā anyatra samaye pācattikaṃ /
T02prmosulu:461: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.42. yo puna bhikṣur anupasaṃpannena pudgalena sārdhaṃ
T02prmosulu:462: uttari dvirātraṃ trirātraṃ vā sahagāraśayyāṃ kalpeya pācattikaṃ /
T02prmosulu:463: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.43. yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣūṇāṃ karmaṇā cchandaṃ datvā paścād duṣṭo doṣāt kupito anāttamano evaṃ vadeya Ō adinno me chando, durdinno me chando, akṛtāny etāni karmāṇi duṣkṛtāny etāni karmāṇi, nāham eteṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ cchandaṃ demīti vadeya pācattikaṃ /
T02prmosulu:464: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.44. yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣum evaṃ vadeya Ō ehi tvam āyuṣman grāmaṃ pinḍāya praviśiṣyāmaḥ
T02prmosulu:465: ahaṃ ca te tatra kiṃcid dāpayiṣyaṃ /
T02prmosulu:466: so tatra tasya kiñcid dāpayitvā vā adāpayitvā vā paścād udyojanaprekṣo evaṃ vadeya Ō gaccha tvam āyuṣman na me tvayā sārdhaṃ phāsu bhavati kathāya vā niṣadyāya vā, ekasyaiva mama phāsu bhavati kathāya vā niṣadyāya vā /
T02prmosulu:467: etad eva pratyayaṃ kṛtvā ananyam, imaṃ tasya bhikṣusya udyojanapācattikaṃ /
T02prmosulu:468: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.45. yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣūn evaṃ vadeya /
T02prmosulu:469: tathāham āyuṣmanto bhagavatā dharmaṃ deśitam ājānāmi yathā ye ime antarāyikā dharmā uktā bhagavatā tān pratisevato nālam antarāyāya /
T02prmosulu:470: so bhikṣu bhikṣūhi evam asya vacanīyo Ō mā āyuṣmann evaṃ vada, mā bhagavantam abhyācakṣa asatā durgṛhītena /
T02prmosulu:471: antarāyikā evāyuṣman dharmāḥ samānā antarāyikā dharmā uktā
T02prmosulu:472: bhagavatā, alaṃ ca punas tān pratiṣevato antarāyāya /
T02prmosulu:473: evaṃ ca so bhikṣu bhikṣūhi vucyamāno taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareya ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ /
T02prmosulu:474: no ca pratinissareya so bhikṣu bhikṣūhi yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyo samanubhāṣitavyo tasya vastusya pratinissargāya /
T02prmosulu:475: yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇo vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇo vā taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareya ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ /
T02prmosulu:476: no ca pratinissareya so bhikṣuḥ samagreṇa saṃghena utkṣipitavyo /
T02prmosulu:478: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.46. yo puna bhikṣur jānan bhikṣuṃ tathā utkṣiptaṃ samagreṇa saṃghena dharmeṇa vinayena yathāvādiṃ tathākāriṃ tāṃ pāpikāṃ
T02prmosulu:479: dṛṣṭiṃ apratinissarantaṃ akṛtānudharmaṃ saṃbhuñjeya vā saṃvaseya vā sahagāraśayyāṃ vā kalpeya pācattikaṃ /
T02prmosulu:480: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.47. śramaṇuddeso pi ced evaṃ vadeya tathāham āyuṣmanto bhagavatā dharmaṃ deśitam ājānāmi yathā ye ime antarāyikā kāmā uktā bhagavatā tān pratisevato nālam antarāyāya /
T02prmosulu:481: so śramaṇuddeśo bhikṣūhi evam asya vacanīyo Ō mā āyuṣman cchramaṇuddeśa evaṃ vada, mā bhagavantam abhyācakṣa asattā durgṛhītena /
T02prmosulu:482: antarāyikā evāyuṣman cchramaṇuddeśa kāmāḥ samānā antarāyikāḥ kāmā uktā bhagavatā /
T02prmosulu:483: alaṃ ca punas tān pratisevato antarāyāya /
T02prmosulu:484: evaṃ ca so śramaṇuddeśo bhikṣūhi vucyamāno taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareya ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ /
T02prmosulu:485: no ca pratinissareya so śramaṇuddeśo bhikṣūhi yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhitavyo samanubhāṣitavyo tasya vastusya pratinissargāya yāvantṛtīyakaṃ samanugrāhiyamāṇo vā samanubhāṣiyamāṇo vā taṃ vastuṃ pratinissareya ity etaṃ kuśalaṃ, no ca pratinissareya so śramaṇuddeśo bhikṣūhi nāśayitavyo Ō adyadagreṇa te āyuṣman śramaṇuddeśa na caiva so bhagavāṃs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho śāstā vyapadiśitavyo /
T02prmosulu:486: yaṃ pi ca dāni labhasi bhikṣūhi sārdhaṃ dvirātraṃ vā trirātraṃ vā sahagāraśayyāṃ sāpi te adyadagreṇa nāsti /
T02prmosulu:488: yo puna bhikṣur jānan tathānāśitaṃ śramaṇuddeśaṃ yathāvādīṃ tathākāriṃ tāṃ pāpikāṃ dṛṣṭim apratinissarantaṃ akṛtānudharmaṃ upasthāpeya vā upalāpeya vā saṃbhuṃjeya vā saṃvaseya vā sahagāraśayyāṃ vā kalpeya pācattikaṃ /
T02prmosulu:489: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.48. navacīvaralābhinā bhikṣuṇā trayāṇāṃ durvarṇīkaraṇānām anyatarānyataraṃ durvaṇīkaraṇam ādayitavyaṃ Ō nīlaṃ vā kardamaṃ vā
T02prmosulu:491: tato ca bhikṣur anādāya navaṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuṃjeya pācattikaṃ /
T02prmosulu:492: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.49. yo puna bhikṣur anyatra adhyārāme vā adhyāvasathe vā ratanaṃ vā ratanasaṃmataṃ vā udgṛhṇeya vā udgṛhṇāpeya vā, pācattikaṃ /
T02prmosulu:493: ākāṃkṣamāṇena bhikṣuṇā ratanaṃ vā ratanasaṃmataṃ vā adhyārāme vā adhyāvasathe vā udgṛhṇitavyaṃ vā udgṛhṇāpayitavyaṃ vā Ō yasya bhaviṣyati so hariṣyatīti /
T02prmosulu:498: tatrāyaṃ samayo Ō dvyardho māso śeṣo grīṣmāṇāṃ, varṣāṇāṃ ca purimo māso ity ete aḍḍhātīyamāsāḥ,
T02prmosulu:505: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.51. yo puna bhikṣur jānan saprāṇakam udakaṃ paribhuñjeya pācattikaṃ /
T02prmosulu:506: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.52. yo puna bhikṣu acelakasya vā acelikāya vā parivrājakasya vā parivrājakāye vā svahastaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā dadyāt pācattikaṃ /
T02prmosulu:507: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.53. yo puna bhikṣur jānan saṃbhojanīye kule
T02prmosulu:509: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.54. yo puna bhikṣur jānan saṃbhojanīye kule
T02prmosulu:511: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.55. yo puna bhikṣur udyuktāṃ senāṃ darśanāya gaccheya pācattikaṃ /
T02prmosulu:512: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.56. syāt tasya bhikṣusya kocid eva pratyayo senāyāṃ
T02prmosulu:513: gamanāya, dvirātraṃ vā trirātraṃ vā tena bhikṣuṇā senāyāṃ vasitavyaṃ /
T02prmosulu:515: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.57. tatrāpi ca bhikṣu dvirātraṃ vā trirātraṃ vā senāyāṃ vasamāno āyūhikaṃ vā niyūddhikaṃ vā anekavyūhaṃ vā saṃgrāmaśīrṣaṃ vā
T02prmosulu:517: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.58. yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣuṃ prahareya pācattikaṃ /
T02prmosulu:518: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.59. yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣusya talaśaktikām āvarjeya
T02prmosulu:520: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.60. yo puna bhikṣur jānan bhikṣusya duṣṭhullām āpattiṃ kṛtām adhyācīrṇāṃ cchādeya, so na pareṣām āroceya kiṃ ti se mā pare
T02prmosulu:527: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.61. yo puna bhikṣuḥ saṃcintya tiryagyonigataṃ prāṇinaṃ
T02prmosulu:529: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.62. yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣusya saṃcintya kaukṛtyam
T02prmosulu:530: upasaṃhareya kiṃ ti se muhūrtaṃ pi aphāsu bhavatū ti pācattikaṃ /
T02prmosulu:531: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.63. yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣusya vā bhikṣuṇīye vā śrāmaṇerasya vā śrāmaṇerīye vā śikṣamāṇāye vā cīvaraṃ datvā apratyuddhareya paribhuṃjeya, apratyuddhāraparibhoge pācattikaṃ PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.64. yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣusya pātraṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā niṣīdanaṃ vā sūcīvigrahaṃ vā apaniheya vā apanihāpeya vā antamaśato
T02prmosulu:533: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.65. yo puna bhikṣur bhikṣuṃ bhīṣeya pācattikam /
T02prmosulu:536: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.68. yo puna bhikṣu mātṛgrāmeṇa sārdhaṃ saṃvidhāya
T02prmosulu:537: adhvānamārgaṃ pratipadyeya antamaśato grāmāntaraṃ pi pācattikaṃ /
T02prmosulu:538: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.69. yo puna bhikṣu mātṛgrāmeṇa sārdhaṃ sahagāraśayyāṃ
T02prmosulu:540: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.70. yo puna bhikṣu mātṛgrāmeṇa sārdhaṃ eko ekāya raho niṣadyāṃ kalpeya pācattikaṃ /
T02prmosulu:545: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.71. yo puna bhikṣur jānan ūnaviṃśativarṣapudgalaṃ bhikṣubhāvāya upasaṃpādeya, so ca pudgalo anupasaṃpanno, te ca bhikṣū
T02prmosulu:547: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.72. yo puna bhikṣur jānan stainyasārthena sārdhaṃ
T02prmosulu:548: saṃvidhāya adhvānamārgaṃ pratipadyeya antamaśato grāmāntaraṃ pi pācattikaṃ
T02prmosulu:549: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.73. yo puna bhikṣuḥ svahastaṃ pṛthivīṃ khaneya vā khanāpeya vā antamaśato iha khanehīti vā vadeya pācattikaṃ /
T02prmosulu:551: taduttariṃ sādiyeya, anyatra punaḥ pravāraṇe, anyatra yāvajjīvikāye pācattikaṃ /
T02prmosulu:552: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.75. yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣūhi evaṃ vucyamāno Ō imehi te
T02prmosulu:553: āyuṣman pañcahi āpattikāyehi anadhyāvācāya śikṣā karaṇīyeti, so bhikṣu tān
T02prmosulu:554: bhikṣūn evaṃ vadeya Ō na yāvad aham āyuṣmantānāṃ vacanena śikṣiṣyaṃ yāvad ahaṃ na drakṣyāmi sthavirān bhikṣūn sūtradharān vinayadharān mātṛkādharān madhyamān bhikṣūn sūtradharān vinayadharān mātṛkādharān, navakān bhikṣūn sūtradharān vinayadharān mātṛkādharān /
T02prmosulu:555: tāṃs tāvad aham upasaṃkramya paripṛcchiṣyaṃ paripraśnīkariṣyaṃ ti, pācattikaṃ /
T02prmosulu:559: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.78. yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣūhi kalahajātehi bhaṇḍanajātehi
T02prmosulu:560: vigrahavivādāpannehi viharantehi upaśrotrasthāne tiṣṭheya Ō yaṃ ete vadiṣyanti taṃ paścād upasaṃhariṣyāmīti /
T02prmosulu:562: ananyam, imaṃ tasya bhikṣusya upaśrotrasthāne pācattikaṃ /
T02prmosulu:563: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.79. yo puna bhikṣuḥ saṃghe viniścayakathāhi vartamānāhi
T02prmosulu:564: utthāyāsanāt prakrameya santaṃ bhikṣum anāmantrayitvā, anyatra tathārūpe atyāyike karaṇīye pācattikaṃ /
T02prmosulu:565: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.80. yo puna bhikṣu āraṇyake śayyāsane viharanto vikāle grāmaṃ praviśeya santaṃ bhikṣum anāmantrayitvā, anyatra tathārūpe atyāyike
T02prmosulu:568: (71) ūnaviṃśati (72) stainyasārtho (73) pṛthivī (74) pravāraṇā (75) na śikṣiṣyaṃ (76) madyapānam (77) anādaryam (78) upaśrotra (79) viniścaya
T02prmosulu:570: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.81. yo puna bhikṣu sabhakto samāno purebhaktaṃ
T02prmosulu:571: paścādbhaktaṃ vā kuleṣu cāritram āpadyeya santaṃ bhikṣum anāmantrayitvā,
T02prmosulu:575: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.82. yo puna bhikṣu rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya
T02prmosulu:577: aniṣkrānte antaḥpure, anirgatehi ratanehi antamaśato indrakīlaṃ pi atikrameya pācattikaṃ
T02prmosulu:578: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.83. yo puna bhikṣu dantamayaṃ vā asthimayaṃ vā śṛṅgamayaṃ vā suvarṇamayaṃ vā rūpyamayaṃ vā ratanamayaṃ vā sūcīvigrahaṃ kārāpeya
T02prmosulu:580: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.84. mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā bhikṣuṇā kārāpayamāṇena
T02prmosulu:581: sugatāṣṭāṅgulapramāṇāḥ pādakāḥ kārāpayitavyāḥ anyatrāṭṭanīye, taduttariṃ kārāpeya cchedanapācattikaṃ
T02prmosulu:582: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.85. yo puna bhikṣuḥ tūlasaṃstṛte mañce vā pīṭhe vā abhiniṣīdeya vā abhi[ni]padyeya vā uddālanapācattikaṃ /
T02prmosulu:583: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.86. niṣīdanaṃ bhikṣuṇā kārāpayamāṇena prāmāṇikaṃ kārāpayitavyaṃ /
T02prmosulu:584: tatredaṃ pramāṇaṃ Ō dīrghaśo dve vitastīyo sugatavitastinā tiryag dvyardham anyatra daśavitastikaṃ
T02prmosulu:586: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.87. kaṇḍūpraticchādanaṃ bhikṣuṇā kārāpayamāṇena prāmāṇikaṃ kārāpayitavyaṃ
T02prmosulu:587: tatredaṃ pramāṇaṃ Ō dīrghaśo catvāri vitastīyo
T02prmosulu:590: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.88. varṣāśāṭikā bhikṣuṇā kārāpayamāṇena prāmāṇikā kārāpayitavyā /
T02prmosulu:591: tatredaṃ pramāṇaṃ Ō dīrghaśo ṣaḍvitastīyo sugatavitastinā,
T02prmosulu:594: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.89. yo puna bhikṣuḥ sugatacīvarapramāṇaṃ cīvaraṃ kārāpeya
T02prmosulu:595: Ō kiñca tasya bhagavato tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya sugatasya
T02prmosulu:596: sugatacīvarapramāṇaṃ? dirghaśo nava vitastīyo sugatavitastinā, tiryak ṣaṭ /
T02prmosulu:597: idaṃ tasya bhagavato tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya sugatasya sugatacīvarapramāṇaṃ
T02prmosulu:598: tato vā punar uttariṃ kārāpeya cchedanapācattikaṃ /
T02prmosulu:599: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.90. yo puna bhikṣu bhikṣusya duṣṭo doṣāt kupito anāttamano amūlakena saṃghātiśeṣeṇa dharmeṇānudhvaṃseya pācattikaṃ /
T02prmosulu:600: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.91. yo puna bhikṣur jānan sāṃghikaṃ lābhaṃ saṃghe pariṇataṃ pudgalo pudgalasya pariṇāmeya pācattikaṃ /
T02prmosulu:601: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pāc.92. yo puna bhikṣur anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe
T02prmosulu:602: uddiśyamāne evaṃ vadeya Ō adya punar ahaṃ jānāmi, idānīṃ punar ahaṃ jānāmi Ō ayaṃ pi dharmo sūtrāgato sūtraparyāpanno anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddeśam āgacchati /
T02prmosulu:603: yāvad ahaṃ na jānāmi tāvan nāstītthaṃ mahyam āpattir jāneṃsu ca te bhikṣu taṃ bhikṣuṃ sakṛd dvikkhuto trikkhuto āgatapūrvaṃ pi sanniṣaṇṇapūrvaṃ pi, kaḥ punar vādo bahuśo /
T02prmosulu:604: nāsti kho punas tasya bhikṣusya ajñānena muktiḥ /
T02prmosulu:605: atha khu yāṃ pi ca so bhikṣur āpattim āpanno tāṃ kṣipram eva yathādharmmaṃ yathāvinayaṃ kārāpayitavyo, uttariṃ ca saṃmoham āpādayitavyo /
T02prmosulu:606: tasya te āyuṣman lābhā durlabdhā yas tvaṃ anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddiśyamāne nāsthīkṛtvā na manasikṛtvā na sarvacetasā samanvāhṛtya avahitaśroto satkṛtya dharmaṃ śṛṇoṣīti /
T02prmosulu:609: (81) sabhakto (82) rājño (83) sūcī gṛhaṃ (84) mañca (85) tūla (86)
T02prmosulu:617: uddiṣṭāḥ kho punar āyuṣmanto dvānavati śuddhapācattikā dharmāḥ /
T02prmosulu:618: tatrāyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ? dvitīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto
T02prmosulu:619: pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ? tṛtīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ? pariśuddhā atrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi /
T02prmosulu:621: ime kho punar āyuṣmanto catvāraḥ prātideśanikā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddeśam āgacchanti Ō
T02prmosulu:622: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pratid.1. yo puna bhikṣu āraṇyake śayanāsane viharanto pūrve apratisaṃveditaṃ bahirdhā apratigṛhītaṃ, antovāsavastusminn agilāno svahastaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā pratigṛhṇitvā khādeya vā bhuñjeya vā bhuktāvinā tena bhikṣuṇā pratideśayitavyaṃ Ō asaṃpreyaṃ me āyuṣman gārhyaṃ prātideśanikaṃ dharmam āpanno /
T02prmosulu:625: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pratid.2. yo puna bhikṣur anyātikāye bhikṣuṇīye antaragṛhaṃ
T02prmosulu:626: praviṣṭāye agilāno svahastaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā pratigṛhṇitvā khādeya vā bhuṃjeya vā bhuktāvinā tena bhikṣuṇā pratideśayitavyaṃ Ō asaṃpreyaṃ me āyuṣman gārhyaṃ prātideśanikaṃ dharmam āpanno /
T02prmosulu:629: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pratid.3. bhikṣu kho punar antaragṛhe nimantritakā bhuñjanti /
T02prmosulu:630: tatra ca bhikṣuṇī viśvāsamānarūpā sthitā bhavati /
T02prmosulu:631: sā evam āha Ō iha odanaṃ dehi, iha sūpaṃ dehi, iha vyañjanaṃ dehīti vā vadeya /
T02prmosulu:632: sarvehi tehi bhikṣuhi sā bhikṣuṇī evam asya vacanīyā Ō āgamaya tāva tvaṃ bhagini yāvad bhikṣū bhuñjantīti /
T02prmosulu:633: ekabhikṣū pi ca tāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ neva vadeya Ō āgamaya tāva tvaṃ bhagini yāvad bhikṣū bhuñjantīti, bhuktāvīhi tehi bhikṣūhi
T02prmosulu:634: pratideśayitavyaṃ Ō asaṃpreyaṃ me āyuṣman gārhyaṃ prātideśanikaṃ dharmam āpanno /
T02prmosulu:637: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Pratid.4. yāni kho punar imāni śaikṣasaṃmatāni kulāni bhavanti tatra ca bhikṣuḥ pūrve apravārito upasaṃkramitvā svahastaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā pratigṛhṇitvā khādeya vā bhuñjeya vā bhuktāvinā tena bhikṣuṇā pratideśayitavyaṃ Ō asaṃpreyaṃ me āyuṣman gārhyaṃ prātideśanikaṃ
T02prmosulu:644: uddiṣṭāḥ kho punar āyuṣmanto catvāraḥ prātideśanikā dharmāḥ /
T02prmosulu:645: tatrāyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ? dvitīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto
T02prmosulu:646: pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ? tṛtīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ? pariśuddhā atrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi /
T02prmosulu:648: ime kho punar āyuṣmanto sātirekapañcāśac chaikṣā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddeśam āgacchanti Ō
T02prmosulu:649: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Śai.1. parimaṇḍalaṃ nivasanaṃ nivāsayiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
T02prmosulu:650: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Śai.2. parimaṇḍalaṃ cīvaraṃ prāvariṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
T02prmosulu:651: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Śai.3. susaṃvṛto antaragṛham upasaṃkramiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
T02prmosulu:652: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Śai.4. na utkṣiptacakṣur antaragṛham upasaṃkramiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
T02prmosulu:653: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Śai.5. alpaśabdo antaragṛham upasaṃkramiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
T02prmosulu:654: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Śai.6. na uccagghikāya antaragṛham upasaṃkramiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
T02prmosulu:655: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Śai.7. na oguṇṭhikāya antaragṛham upasaṃkramiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
T02prmosulu:656: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Śai.8. na utkṣiptikāya antaragṛham upasaṃkramiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /
T02prmosulu:657: PrMoSū(Mā-L)Śai.9. na utkuṭukāya antaragṛham upasaṃkramiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā /

T02prmosulu:751: uddiṣṭāḥ kho punar āyuṣmanto sātirekapañcāśac chaikṣā dharmāḥ /
T02prmosulu:752: tatrāyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ? dvitīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto
T02prmosulu:753: pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ? tṛtīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ? pariśuddhā atrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi /
T02prmosulu:755: ime kho punar āyuṣmanto sapta adhikaraṇasamathā dharmā anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddeśam āgacchanti ye utpannotpannānām adhikaraṇānāṃ śamathāya vyapaśamathāya saṃvartante /
T02prmosulu:764: uddiṣṭāḥ kho punar āyuṣmanto sapta adhikaraṇaśamathā dharmāḥ /
T02prmosulu:765: tatrāyuḥmanto pṛcchāmi Ō kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ? dvitīyaṃ pi āyuḥmanto
T02prmosulu:766: pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ? tṛtīyaṃ pi āyuḥmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ? pariśuddhā atrāyuḥmanto yasmāt tūḥṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi /
T02prmosulu:768: ime kho punar āyuṣmanto duve dharmāḥ Ō dharmo anudharmaś ca anvardhamāsaṃ sūtre prātimokṣe uddeśam āgacchanti /
T02prmosulu:769: tatra dharmo nāma yam ubhayato vinayo /
T02prmosulu:771: uddiṣṭāḥ kho punar āyuṣmanto duve dharmāḥ dharmo anudharmaś ca /
T02prmosulu:772: tatrāyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi Ō kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ? dvitīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto
T02prmosulu:773: pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ? tṛtīyaṃ pi āyuṣmanto pṛcchāmi kaccittha pariśuddhāḥ? pariśuddhā atrāyuṣmanto yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi /
T02prmosulu:774: uddiṣṭaṃ kho punar āyuṣmanto prātimokṣasya vastu /
T02prmosulu:784: uddiṣṭā duve dharmāḥ, dharmo anudharmaś ca /
T02prmosulu:787: yo vā anyo 'pi kaścid dharmasya anudharmo tatra samagrehi sarvehi sahitehi saṃmodamānehi avivadamānehi ekuddeśehi kṣīrodakībhūtehi śāstuḥ śāsanaṃ dīpayamānehi sukhaṃ ca phāsuṃ ca
T02prmosulu:789: kṣāntiḥ paramaṃ tapo titikṣā nirvāṇaṃ paramaṃ vadanti buddhāḥ /
T02prmosulu:790: na hi pravrajitaḥ paropatāpī śravaṇo bhoti parān viheṭhayānaḥ //
T02prmosulu:791: idaṃ tasya bhagavato vipaśyisya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya acirābhisaṃbuddhasya nirarbude bhikṣusaṃghe saṃkṣiptena prātimokṣaṃ subhāṣitaṃ /
T02prmosulu:793: mātrajñatā ca bhaktasmiṃ prāntaṃ ca śayanāsanaṃ /
T02prmosulu:795: idaṃ tasya bhagavato śikṣisya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya acirābhisaṃbuddhasya nirarbude bhikṣusaṃghe saṃkṣiptena prātimokṣaṃ subhāṣitaṃ //
T02prmosulu:796: adhicetasi mā pramādyato munino maunapadeṣu śikṣataḥ /
T02prmosulu:797: śokā na bhavanti tāyino upaśāntasya sadā smṛtīmataḥ //
T02prmosulu:798: idaṃ tasya bhagavato viśvabhuvasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya acirābhisaṃbuddhasya nirarbude bhikṣusaṃghe saṃkṣiptena prātimokṣaṃ subhāṣitaṃ //
T02prmosulu:801: idaṃ tasya bhagavato krakucchandasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya acirābhisaṃbuddhasya nirarbude bhikṣusaṃghe saṃkṣiptena prātimokṣaṃ subhāṣitaṃ //
T02prmosulu:802: yathā hi bhramaro puṇyaṃ varṇagandham aheṭhayaṃ /
T02prmosulu:803: paraiti rasam ādāya evaṃ grāme muniś caret //
T02prmosulu:804: na pareṣāṃ vilomāni na pareṣāṃ kṛtākṛtaṃ /
T02prmosulu:805: ātmano tu samīkṣeta kṛtāny akṛtāni ca //
T02prmosulu:806: idaṃ tasya bhagavato konākamunisya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya acirābhisaṃbuddhasya nirarbude bhikṣusaṃghe saṃkṣiptena prātimokṣaṃ subhāṣitam /
T02prmosulu:807: nāsti dhyānam aprajñasya prajñā nāsti adhyāyato /
T02prmosulu:808: yasya dhyānaṃ ca prajñā ca sa vai nirvāṇasya antike //
T02prmosulu:810: indriyai guptiḥ saṃtuṣṭiḥ prātimokṣe ca saṃvaro //
T02prmosulu:813: tataḥ prāmodya bahulo bhikṣu nirvāṇasyaiva antike //
T02prmosulu:814: idaṃ tasya bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya acirābhisaṃbuddhasya nirarbude bhikṣusaṃghe saṃkṣiptena prātimokṣaṃ subhāṣitam //
T02prmosulu:815: cakṣuṣā saṃvaraḥ sādhuḥ sādhuḥ śrotreṇa saṃvaraḥ /
T02prmosulu:816: ghrāṇena saṃvaraḥ sādhuḥ sādhuḥ jihvāya saṃvaraḥ //
T02prmosulu:817: kāyena saṃvaraḥ sādhuḥ manasā sādhu saṃvaraḥ /
T02prmosulu:819: idaṃ tasya bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ śākyādhirājasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksambuddhasya acirābhisaṃbuddhasya nirarbude bhikṣusaṃghe saṃkṣiptena prātimokṣaṃ subhāṣitam /
T02prmosulu:821: kīrtitāny aprameyāṇi ........... tiṣṭam a ......... ṇāś ca //
T02prmosulu:822: kṣāntivādī ca bhagavān vipaśyī anopavadyaṃ ca śikhī prakāśayati /
T02prmosulu:823: adhicittaṃ ca viśvabhūḥ akaraṇaṃ ca pāpānāṃ krakucchandaḥ /
T02prmosulu:824: caryāṃ ca konākamuniḥ dhyānāni ca kāśyapo prakāśayati /
T02prmosulu:826: ete sapta daśabalā mahāprajñā amitabuddhī saptānāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām abhinnān .... lokākhyādhipatīnāṃ dharmākhyānāni uktāni /
T02prmosulu:831: samāptaṃ prātimokṣasūtraṃ āryamahāsāṃghikānāṃ lokottaravādināṃ madhyoddeśikānāṃ pāṭha iti
T02prmosulu:832: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ pi teṣāṃ tathāgato hy avadat* /
T02prmosulu:833: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśravaṇaḥ /
